subject: Medicine
title: Personalized Medicine
description: A quick win: understand Personalized Medicine.

buildup.text: Your genome reveals which treatments will work best for you.

discovery.text: Cancer care already uses tumor DNA to choose specific drugs.

twist.text: Two patients with the same cancer may get different treatments.

climax.text: Personalized plans improve survival and reduce side effects.

quiz.question: How does personalized medicine choose treatments?
options: Based on a patient's genetic profile
Based on the patient's age only
